Name: Snow Jewels
About the game: In this chilling match3 adventure, the Snow Dragon's icy breath is ready to destroy all it touches in the Mountain Lands. Only the magic of the Snow Jewels can stop the ruthless monster. It's time for an average girl from our world to go to battle. Her cat Halburt has the rare gift of being able to distinguish Snow Jewels from regular gems. Collect chains of gems and help bring back peace and tranquility to the Mountain Lands!
Meta Title: Snow Jewels: May 30, 2019, Joyful Software and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Snow Jewels? Check out the release date (May 30, 2019), developer insights from Joyful Software, and a complete game summary.
